title: How do I remove the symbol above my name when I lock camera?
body: There is a light and a symbol when I lock my camera, when I unlock it, it goes away, how do I get rid of it? I needed to re-install league today because when I change to korean (im not korean) language because I love the sounds in korean, it wouldn't work so now I get a error when I change the language. Does anyone know how to fix that? And how to remove the light when I lock my camera. Thanks

replies.body:
In settings (in game) there is an option that says "highlight when centre" or something. Uncheck that box.

EDIT: Settings - Interface - Notifications

Thanks so much.
Any chance you would know about the language?

Try running the Hextech Repair Tool; hopefully that fixes you right up!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

Thanks for help!
So what do I do after I download it?
